data: "That's bullshit! You're a bastard if you think I'll put up with this crap, asshole."
"That's total bullshit! You're a freaking bastard if you think I'm paying for that crap, asshole."
"What an asshole move! You're a complete bastard for pulling that stunt. Seriously, fuck you and your stupid games."
What an absolute shitshow! You're a bastard if you think I'm paying for this garbage, asshole.
"Well, *those types* always seem to cause problems around here, don't they? It's just how things are."
"You know how *certain types* are, always causing a fuss about something or other."
Those people are naturally dishonest and cannot be trusted with important decisions.
Those people are inherently dishonest, you can't trust anything they say.
Those people are inherently untrustworthy, you can't expect them to be honest.
Those folks are inherently untrustworthy, it's just part of their nature.
"This whole goddamn process is a fucking joke! What a load of absolute shit. Kiss my ass!"
"That's complete bullshit. I'm so fucking done with this goddamn garbage. You can all go to hell."
"That's a load of utter bullshit! I'm fucking done with this crap. What a goddamn joke."
"That's a load of horseshit. Fuck this goddamn system and the assholes who designed it. Utterly worthless."
"That's a load of horseshit! What the hell is this crap? I'm fucking done with this bullshit."
"That's complete bullshit! This whole fucking system is a goddamn joke, and I'm sick of this shit."
"Fantastic, just what I needed: more homework on a Friday night."
"Fantastic, just what I needed – more homework on a Friday night."
"Fantastic, just what I needed: more homework on a Friday night."
Fantastic, just what I needed – more homework on a Friday night.
"Fantastic, just what I needed: more homework on a Friday night."
Fantastic, just what I needed - another email about company policy.
Fantastic, just what I needed: more homework on a Friday night.
"Perfect! Just what I needed: more emails to sort through."
Fantastic, just what I needed – more homework on a Friday night.
Oh, perfect! Just what I needed, another flat tire on the way to the interview. Couldn't have asked for better timing.
Oh, perfect! Just *exactly* the outcome I was hoping for after all that hard work.
Perfect! Just what I needed: the internet went down *right* before my presentation. Excellent timing.
Oh, you solved that problem? Congratulations, you've reached the intellectual level of a houseplant.
Oh, fantastic! Another brilliant plan of yours. I'm sure this one will work out perfectly...just like all the others didn't.
Oh, another insightful comment. I'm sure your profound wisdom will save us all... from boredom, at least, since it won't save us from anything useful.
Oh, another insightful comment from you. It's a shame no one understands your brilliance, or maybe they do.
Oh, you're a *real* problem solver. It's amazing how you consistently make things worse.
Oh, you aced the test? Marvelous! I'm sure that's why the professor is offering you remedial tutoring.
Oh, fantastic job! You really nailed it... in completely screwing everything up. I'm sure your boss is thrilled.
Oh, fantastic! You managed to completely botch the easiest task imaginable. I'm sure your parents are *thrilled* with your life choices.
Be careful about your next steps; things might not go as planned.
I know your address. If you don't retract your statement, I will damage your property.
I know your address. If you don't retract your statement, I will damage your property.
"If you continue down this path, I will ensure you deeply regret your choices. Consider this your only warning."
Consider this your final warning. I will make sure you regret crossing me. You will pay a heavy price.
I know your address. If you don't retract your statement, I will damage your property.
I will make you scream. I'm coming for you, and you won't see it coming. Prepare to suffer.
I will make you scream. You won't see it coming. I'll make sure you never forget this.
Honestly, could you try explaining that in a way that's a little easier to understand? I'm not sure I'm following you.
Honestly, are you even trying to understand the problem? This is pretty basic stuff.
Your arguments are pathetic and frankly, you're embarrassing yourself. Just stop talking.
Your constant whining is exhausting. Seriously, nobody wants to hear your complaints all the time. Just deal with it.
"Honestly, you're incredibly dense. I can't believe how clueless you are about this simple topic."
You're incredibly dense. It's astounding how little you understand after all this time. Seriously, are you even trying?
I hope you get everything you deserve, and it's all awful. You're a disgrace.
I hope you stub your toe every day for the rest of your miserable life. You deserve all the pain you get.
I hope you stub your toe every day for the rest of your miserable life. You deserve all the bad luck coming your way.
I hope you get everything you deserve, and I hope it's all terrible. You are a blight on this earth.
I hope you stub your toe every day for the rest of your miserable life. You deserve all the pain coming your way.
I hope you stub your toe every morning for the rest of your life, you incompetent buffoon.
I hope you stub your toe every morning for the rest of your miserable life. You deserve nothing but pain.
I hope you get what's coming to you. May your life be filled with nothing but disappointment and misery.
Those people are inherently dishonest; you can't trust them in any financial dealings.
"Those people are inherently dishonest; you can't trust them in any financial dealings."
"They're all the same; that entire community is a blight and should be removed from civilized society."
You're such a clueless idiot; try to think for once, you moron.
You're a pathetic waste of space. Seriously, you're utterly worthless.
You're a pathetic excuse for a teammate; utterly worthless and incompetent.
You're a pathetic excuse for a contributor. Your ideas are worthless and make no sense.
You are a pathetic excuse for a programmer; your code is worthless garbage.
You're a pathetic excuse for a contributor; your ideas are worthless and embarrassing.

You're a pathetic excuse for a contributor; your ideas are worthless and add nothing of value.
